user.description: Do you want to start the setup? The initial setup will take about 30-40 seconds.

speedtest.name: Speed test
speedtest.description: Immediately executes a speed test with Fast.com.

service_deprecation.title: Fast.com speedtest service is being removed

confirm.title: [%key:component::fastdotcom::issues::service_deprecation::title%]
confirm.description: Fast.com speedtest service is deprecated and will be removed in Home Assistant 2024.7. Please adjust any automation or script that uses the service. As a replacement the homeassistant.update_entity can be used instead.
